26 Charlene Castro

Position Pitcher/Designated Hitter

Height 5-7

Class Senior

High School Natalia

Hometown Natalia, Texas

Prev School Natalia HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

CAREER ACCOMPLISHMENTS

2017 Preseason All-SWAC Second Team selection

2016 Tied single-season record for most home runs as a freshman in school history (eight)

2016 SWAC Co-Freshman of the Year

2016 College Sports Madness SWAC Player of the Week (3/15)

2016 Two-time SWAC Hitter of the Week (3/7, 3/28)

2016 College Sports Madness Preseason Freshman of the Year

FRESHMAN SEASON (2016)

Started in 52 of 55 games

Among SWAC ranks, was seventh in batting average (.390), fifth in slugging percentage (.617), third in hits (60), first in RBI (45), tied for third in doubles (11), tied for fourth in home runs (eight), fourth in total bases (95), tied for fifth in total plate appearances (169), fifth in at bats (154)

Against SWAC opponents, batted conference-best .518, had the third-best slugging percentage (.821), second-best on-base percentage (.557), second most hits (29), fourth most RBI (22), most doubles (eight), tied for seventh most home runs (three), and third most total bases (46)

HIGH SCHOOL

Played four years at Natalia High School

Held a record of 23-1 with a 0.74 ERA in 25 appearances during her senior season

Struck out 136 batters in 122.2 innings pitched

At the plate, batted .621 (54-for-107) with 31 runs scored, 12 home runs, 13 doubles and 66 RBI

Express News All-District 26-3A MVP

Recorded a 0.85 ERA and struck out 256 batters in 173.1 innings pitched in her junior season

Hit .624 (53-for-85) with nine home runs, 15 doubles and 44 RBI

Four-time All-District Team selection

Named three time District Most Valuable Player

Two-time member of 5A Super Team

Named offensive player of the year

All-State Texas Girls Coachesâ€™ Association (TGCA) First Team selection

All-State TGCA Second Team selection

All-State Texas Sports Writer Association Second Team selection

Member of National Honor Society

Named to A-B Honor Roll

Named Vice President of her class

PERSONAL

Daughter of Jackie and Jacob Castro of Natalia, Texas

Has two siblings - Britteny (21) and Connor (12)

Majoring in Business Management
